headline: The Age of AI Agents Brings a Risk No One Is Prepared For
summary: Artificial-intelligence companies have promised that 2026 will be the year of agents: Software that can use AI language models to autonomously execute a complex series of tasks from simple instructions.  The most prevalent use for agents today is for making software.  With enough of a budget, a single developer can orchestrate teams of agents to work on existing codebases or even to start a project from scratch.

raw.headline: The Age of AI Agents Brings a Risk No One Is Prepared For

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Palo Alto Networks (PANW) After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are asking whether Palo Alto Networks at around US$181 per share still offers value or carries more risk than reward, you are not alone. The stock is roughly flat year to date with a 1.2% return, after a 5.0% decline over the last week and a 4.2% decline over the last month, while the 3 year and 5 year returns of 139.1% and 224.9% highlight how much the story has changed over time. Recent coverage has focused on Palo Alto Networks' position as a major cybersecurity platform provider...
